page.title: 10 LOCAL GOVERNMENT-WEST ROW
page.content: THERE ARE THREE TIERS OF LOCAL GOVERNMENT IN THIS AREA - THE MILDEN- HALL PARISH COUNCIL,THE FOREST HEATH DISTRICT COUNCIL AND THE SUFFOLK COUNTY COUNCIL. WEST ROW WARD FORMS PART OF THE PARISH OF MILDENHALL,ONE OF THE LARGEST PARISHES IN THE COUNTRY. WEST ROW'S COUNCILLORS ARE MR.G.BALLS,MR.F.FORD AND MR.J.LEONARD. WEST ROW IS COMBINED WITH BECK ROW TO FORM A TWO-SEAT WARD OF THE FOREST HEATH DISTRICT COUNCIL.THE CURRENT DISTRICT COUNCILLORS ARE MR.J.HAYLOCK AND MR.P.J.R.PENDLETON. WEST ROW, BECK ROW, HOLYWELL ROW AND THE SLIGHTLY LARGER AREA OF LAKENHEATH COMBINE TO FORM THE ROWHEATH SEAT ON THE SUFFOLK COUNTY COUNCIL.
